Reviews.Title: Great price, great service, GREAT laptop
Reviews.Author: Shawna Whiteaker
Reviews.Content: As usual, Amazon comes through with flying colors.  I ordered this a week before Christmas, was expecting delivery on Monday, the 24th, received it on Friday, the 21st.  Daughter was ecstatic about early delivery and LOVES it!!!!  Charged it up and she's been on it non-stop for the last three days.  Took her a bit to get the hang of Windows 8, but says it works 1000 times better then the Windows Vista that was on her last laptop.  Fast Processing and outstanding color, picture nice and big for watching movies. More than enough storage space for all her music files.  Very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Patrice H.
Reviews.Content: Loved that I have the windows 8! It was pretty annoying at first but once you get the hang of it you start having so much fun setting it up just the way you like it. It works great and its fast and is lightweight and is easy ti carry around to work and everywhere I  want to go.

Reviews.Title: Everything I was looking for in a laptop
Reviews.Author: manne
Reviews.Content: Really love this laptop. Arrived on time and was nicely packaged. Everything I was looking for in a laptop and also had windows 8...which I'm still getting the hang of. Love this HP!!! Amazon did it again!! Thanks

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Lisa Fryar
Reviews.Content: I am a Big fan of hp and they didn't let me down with this laptop, I use it everyday for at least 3 hours a day and haven't had any problems...I'll put my hp against any other brand...

Reviews.Title: Outstanding for its Price
Reviews.Author: Ramarius Cooley
Reviews.Content: I think this laptop is great! I have not had any problems with it yet. It has a great look and it comes with windows 8 and Norton Security's virus system. This laptop was definitely worth it's price

Reviews.Title: great product and seller
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: happy with this product very reasonable price, fast delive,ry ,very stylish black HP laptop ,very dependable seller, Packaging was great , very cheap for the HP laptop  very durable ,the price is great

Reviews.Title: Windows 8?
Reviews.Author: Simon J. Leonard
Reviews.Content: I haven't mad up my mind if I like the Windows 8 program yet.  Windows 7 was the best since XP.  When I use it more I might begin to like it better.  We have other computers with Windows XP, Windows Vista and Windows 7.  This computer replaced the one which had Vista which I didn't like.  I would like this computer better if it had a numeric keyboard on the right side.  Other brand laptops with a 15.5" screen do have the numeric keyboard on the right.  The more I use the windows 8 on this computer the better I like it.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Mario A Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Excellent price.I have problems when the computer goes into hibernating mode. You have to hard shut down and restart to continue working. Other than that, you get what you need.

Reviews.Title: Great Student Laptop
Reviews.Author: Shelley A. Sharkey
Reviews.Content: This is the second HP laptop I've purchased for my elementary aged children, just so they could each have their own.  Easy to set-up and use, works flawlessly and great performance over wifi.  Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Gustavo Ortiz
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Hola , en verdad el envio fue mas rapido que lo que esperaba .El equipo llego en buen estado y cumple con todas las caracteristicas de lo que compre .En verdad muy satisfecho Muchas Gracias

Reviews.Title: WOW!  Learning Curve
Reviews.Author: Toddler Mom
Reviews.Content: I have to say that I was excited to be able to order a new laptop.  Now that I have it, I am having fun exploring and learning and experimenting.  I have a window 8 cell phone, so I thought it wouldn't be a big adjustment; and yet, WOW!  Learn. Ing. Curve!  But so far I'm happy.  I am pretty good with using computers and when I have a new program it usually doesn't take me long to figure it out, so I am having fun exploring and what not.  If you are like my husband though, someone who does not do change well, buyer beware.  To me though, it just means he will leave my laptop alone!  (and that is a good thing)

Reviews.Title: My son loves it.
Reviews.Author: J. MICHAEL DEPOY
Reviews.Content: Replaced another HP that he really loved and used until it died,ut he got every bit of value out of the old one and the new oneis excellent and significantly faster.

Reviews.Title: Most Frustrating laptop I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Who Me
Reviews.Content: Pro:  Good Battery Life.Con:  Hangs and or freezes frequently.  Due to this can't play any half decent games.  Don't touch the touch pad.  It has a mind of it's own.  The touch pad doesn't know whether it's supposed to act like a touch pad on a laptop, or a touch screen on a smart phone, therefore it randomly selects what it wants to do.  Do not rest your palms on the laptop.  You will end up in strange and unknown places within the computer.  For a non-smart phone user, Windows 8 is the most unfriendly program I have ever used.  Just trying to shut down the computer is an ordeal.  Have to find just the right spot in the lower right corner.  Then catch the "settings" button before it disappears.  Now catch the Power button.  Now shut off.  What a pain.  What ever happened to the start/shut down icon?  Everything else most people without Iphones want to do is hidden and you have to figure out how to find it.  All in all I'd say this computer and windows 8 were designed to drive people to the nut house.  I would never recommend this computer to anyone.  Not even those people I dislike!

Reviews.Title: great laptop
Reviews.Author: saint
Reviews.Content: Its wonderful ,came on time ,works well ,great buy ,and with a 500 hd it just out of this world.i would recommend this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Good speed, so far no problems
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I really like the speed on this computer, I have not have any problems with the software so far. I really like the color and the design.

Reviews.Title: I like it very much
Reviews.Author: Susan A. Balmes
Reviews.Content: this laptop is easy to use and I'm not a computer wiz! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a new laptop.

Reviews.Title: My Appreciation
Reviews.Author: komlavi
Reviews.Content: Although it is too early to give a correct appreciation of this product I can say it is very comfortable.It is simple to manipulate and easy to curry out. I like its performance as window 8 system.I could with the time recommend it as a PC to friends and even family members who may be are still thinking that only DELL or Toshiba lap tops are the best ones.Tanks.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have an HP laptop at work that I love so I bought one for my personal use.....Well, huge mistake!!!! This is a HP 2000 notebook. It is so slow it is like having dial up again. Also the curser freezes up constantly. Every time I use it, I have to shut the machine down several times because it freezes up. And DESPISE Windows 8! Most aggravating, user unfriendly program I have ever used. I would love to throw this pathetic laptop out the window!!!! Come on HP!!! I KNOW you can do better than this!!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price & FAST
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Only complaint would be the touch pad being a little off at times but only while on FB (zooming in randomly). If you plan to use that site often you may want to think other wise. I however have found no other issues and would still recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Transaction
Reviews.Author: Debra Moyer
Reviews.Content: Item is exactly as expected. Even more than I thought. I would love to do business sometime in the future.

Reviews.Title: hp does not work as advertised
Reviews.Author: Laura Hughes
Reviews.Content: This computer has not worked as good as advertised. I am ill ,bed ridden, I play games on Pogo, this computer will not hold some Pogo games, will not hold  Java for some games. I have taken to a sales computers and was told the Java system and Windows 8 and Pogo programs are not working together.  I can not return the computer,to late from date of sale, goes to show you bad  merchandise is sold with no sales person to help leaving customers wander what to do next. .

Reviews.Title: Not the best
Reviews.Author: mai8ko
Reviews.Content: I think it's the windows 8 that is the real killer.  Fast browsing, and generally a good size and feel.  Only thing is windows browsing sometimes crashes, and the mouse pad is jumpy.  it hops around from place to place and opens other windows unintentionally.  Luckily the laptop was cheap.  I'll use this for a few years just to get me by, but you can bet that the next laptop that I get wont have windows 8.

Reviews.Title: I'm unsure what the problem is there but otherwise it great. Nice speed too.
Reviews.Author: maurica king
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this laptop the unlock page never came up twice after putting it to sleep and had to remove the battery to start up. I'm unsure what the problem is there but otherwise it great. Nice speed too.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: nick
Reviews.Content: great very happy with the purchase its a great lap top for a great price im should buy another one

Reviews.Title: HP 2000-2b20NR 15.6 Laptop
Reviews.Author: MBarr
Reviews.Content: This review is more for Windows 8 than it is for the HP computer.  If you have problems registering for a Microsoft account, the computer is useless. And if you make a mistake when registering for this account, you cannot reset the computer to delete the incorrect informaiton.  Consequently, you cannot get into the applications. After 5 resets and 8 hours of frustration with little help from Tech Support (HP & Microsoft), I returned the computer to Amazon.  Based on my research, it's almost impossible to buy a computer today that doesn't have Windows 8. Be extremely careful when you are registering for the Microsoft account. Otherwise, you will get locked out and have to return the PC because you cannot use any of the applications.  Windows 8 is not my friend.Amazon was great about refunding my money.  The next time I want to buy a computer, I will buy it from a store that has hands on help.

Reviews.Title: thks
Reviews.Author: Jetlee16
Reviews.Content: HP 2000-2b20NR 15.6-Inch Laptop working perfect, condition brand new, i love it, i would recommend it to my friends for sure

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn
Reviews.Content: I love my HP laptop. It has everything I need in a computer: large screen size, plenty of hard drive space, USB ports, memory card slot, long-lasting battery. It took me a little while to learn Windows 8 but it wasn't too hard for me to pick up.

Reviews.Title: good laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: Harooni
Reviews.Content: excellent laptop , you can't beat this and the Pentium chip is much better than an amd chip. had to buy one before these models were sold out.

Reviews.Title: Gosh its so sexy
Reviews.Author: Chachawavey
Reviews.Content: its  so fast the physical design is so sexy and I love it but there's only two problems Ocean Reef took off the serial number on the laptop.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Nancy Baker
Reviews.Content: I wanted a laptop that was easy to use and had a big enough screen.  That is exactly what I got.
